column1: S0235.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0235.DECK.  235. SURVEY NUMBER
S0235.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.

S0235.Q1. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARM? E. IF YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE ARMY BEFORE, THEN WERE OUT FOR A WHILE, JUST CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE IN THE NATIONAL GUARD, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT WAS ACTIVATED FOR THE PRESENT EMERGENCY.  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 1 1/2 YEARS 4. OVER 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 1.2 YEARS 6. OVER 1.2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 3 1/2 YEARS 8. OVER 3 1/2 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q2. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN OVERSEA?  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO A YEAR 3. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 1 1/2 YEARS 4. OVER 1 1/2 YEARS UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 2 1/2 YEARS 6. OVER 2 1/2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 7. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q3. HAVE YOU EVER BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT OR UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WA?  1. I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT WITH THE ENEMY 2. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT, BUT I HAVE BEEN UNDER SOME KIND OF ENEMY FIRE (GROUND OR AIR) 3. NO, I HAVE NOT BEEN IN COMBAT NOR UNDER ANY KIND OF ENEMY FIRE FROM THE GROUND OR AIR 0. NO ANSWER I. IF YOU ARE IN THE AIR FORCES, SKIP QUESTION 4 AND GO ON TO QUESTION 5.

S0235.Q4. ABOUT HOW MANY DAYS HAVE YOU BEEN IN COMBAT SINCE COMING OVERSEA? (DO NOT COUNT ANY TIME YOU WERE IN REST CAMP OR IN THE HOSPITAL OR ON FURLOUGH.)  01. 1-27 DAYS 02. 28-55 03. 56-111 04. 112-167 05. 168-223 06. 224-279 07. 280-335 08. 336-391 09. 392 DAYS OR MORE 10. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN COMBAT, NONE 00. NO ANSWER, ALTHOUGH NOT IN AIR FORCES 99. INAPPLICABLE (IN AIR FORCES) I. IF YOU ARE IN THE AIR FORCES, ANSWER THIS QUESTION. IF YOU ARE NOT IN THE AIR FORCES, GO ON TO QUESTION 6.

S0235.Q5A. WHAT KIND OF A SQUADRON ARE YOU I?  1. SERVICE SQUADRON IN A FIGHTER OR BOMBER GROUP 2. FIGHTER SQUADRON 3. BOMBER SQUADRON 4. SOME OTHER TYPE OF OUTFIT 9. INAPPLICABLE (NOT IN AIR FORCES), NO ANSWER

S0235.Q5B. WHAT TYPE OF JOB DO YOU HAVE AT PRESEN?  1. COMBAT FLYING JOB 2. GROUND CREW - "LINE" JOB-WORKING ON PLANES 3. OTHER GROUND JOB 9. INAPPLICABLE (NOT IN AIR FORCES), NO ANSWER I. EVERYONE SHOULD ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS.
S0235.Q6. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRAD?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT (ANY GRADE) OR TECHNICIAN 3RD OR 4TH GRADE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q7. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOO?  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL, BUT DIDN'T FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q8. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDA?  01. 19 YEARS OR LESS 02. 20 YEARS 03. 21 04. 22 05. 23 06. 24 07. 25 08. 26-29 09. 30-34 10. 35-37 YEARS 11. 38 YEARS OR MORE 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 9 AND 10 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

S0235.Q9. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED, OR WIDOWE? F. IF MARRIED:  Q.10. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAV?  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED, HAVE NO CHILDREN 5. MARRIED, HAVE ONE CHILD 6. MARRIED, HAVE TWO CHILDREN 7. MARRIED, HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q11. AS FAR AS YOU KNOW, HOW MANY POINTS DO YOU HAVE UNDER THE ARMY POINT SCORE PLA?  1. UNDER 40 POINTS 2. 40-49 3. 50-59 4. 60-74 5. 75-84 6. 85 POINTS OR MORE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q12. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN YOUR PRESENT OUTFI?  1. LESS THAN 1 MONTH 2. 1-2 MONTHS 3. 3-5 MONTHS 4. 6-11 MONTHS 5. 12 MONTHS AND OVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q13. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIM?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q14A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT THE IMPORTANCE OF THE WORK YOU ARE DOING RIGHT NOW AS COMPARED WITH OTHER JOBS YOU MIGHT BE DOING IN THE ARM?  1. IT IS ABOUT AS IMPORTANT AS ANY OTHER JOB I COULD DO 2. IT IS FAIRLY IMPORTANT, BUT I COULD DO MORE IMPORTANT WORK 3. IT HARDLY SEEMS IMPORTANT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 14B NOT CODED.

S0235.Q15. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY HAS TRIED ITS BEST TO SEE THAT MEN GET AS SQUARE A DEAL AS POSSIBL?  1. YES, IT HAS TRIED ITS BEST 2. IT HAS TRIED SOME BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT HAS HARDLY TRIED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q16. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARM?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVEN'T GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q17. DO YOU THINK THE OUTFIT YOU ARE IN NOW PAYS TOO MUCH ATTENTION, TOO LITTLE OR ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT OF ATTENTION TO INSPECTIONS AND "SPIT AND POLISH"*  1. TOO LITTLE ATTENTION 2. TOO MUCH ATTENTION 3. ABOUT THE RIGHT AMOUNT 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q18. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST TO LOOK OUT FOR THE WELFARE OF ENLISTED ME?  1. YES, IT IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. IT IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q19. IN THE ARMY, SOME JOBS ARE NATURALLY HARDER AND MORE DANGEROUS THAN OTHERS AND THE ARMY HAS TO PUT MEN WHERE IT THINKS THEY ARE NEEDED. DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST TO SEE THAT THE MEN WHO HAVE THE HARD AND DANGEROUS JOBS GET THE SPECIAL CONSIDERATION AND BREAKS THEY DESERV?  1. YES, IT IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. IT IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q0. NOT USED  Y. COL. 30 NOT USED.
S0235.Q20. HOW RESENTFUL DO YOU YOURSELF FEEL ABOUT TROOPS WHO HAVE JOBS IN THE UNITED STATE?  1. VERY RESENTFUL 2. FAIRLY RESENTFUL 3. NOT SO RESENTFUL 4. NOT RESENTFUL AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q21. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRIT?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q22. WHAT IS YOUR BEST GUESS AS TO HOW MUCH LONGER YOU WILL BE IN THE ARMY BEFORE YOU ARE DISCHARGE?  01. LESS THAN 2 MONTHS 02. 2 TO LESS THAN 4 03. 4 TO LESS THAN 6 04. 6 TO LESS THAN 8 05. 8 TO LESS THAN 10 06. 10 TO LESS THAN 12 07. 12 TO LESS THAN 15 08. 15 TO LESS THAN 18 09. 18 TO LESS THAN 24 10. 24 TO LESS THAN 30 11. 30 MONTHS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q23. DO YOU THINK WHEN YOU ARE DISCHARGED YOU WILL GO BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE WITH A FAVORABLE OR UNFAVORABLE ATTITUDE TOWARD THE ARM?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. ABOUT 50-50 4. FAIRLY UNFAVORABLE 5. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q24. IN GENERAL, WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM)*  1. IT IS VERY GOOD 2. IT IS FAIRLY GOOD 3. IT IS NOT SO GOOD 4. IT IS NOT GOOD AT ALL 5. I DON'T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT IT TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q25. AS FAR AS YOU CAN TELL, HOW IS THE ARMY SCORE CARD PLAN (THE POINT SYSTEM) WORKING OUT UP TO NO?  1. VERY WELL 2. PRETTY WELL 3. PRETTY BADLY 4. VERY BADLY 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q26. WHAT IS YOUR BEST GUESS AS TO HOW MUCH LONGER YOU WILL HAVE TO SERVE SOMEWHERE OVERSEA?  01. LESS THAN 2 MONTHS 02. 2 TO LESS THAN 4 03. 4 TO LESS THAN 6 04. 6 TO LESS THAN 8 05. 8 TO LESS THAN 10 06. 10 TO LESS THAN 12 07. 12 TO LESS THAN 15 08. 15 TO LESS THAN 18 09. 18 TO LESS THAN 24 10. 24 TO LESS THAN 30 11. 30 MONTHS AND OVER 00. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q27. NOW THAT THE WAR IS OVER WHO DO YOU THINK THE ARMY SHOULD USE FOR OCCUPYING THE DEFEATED COUNTRIE?  1. SOME ANSWER WRITTEN IN 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q28. ALTHOUGH THE WAR IS OVER, THERE IS STILL A BIG JOB FOR THE ARMY TO DO IN OCCUPYING THE DEFEATED COUNTRIES AND IN COMPLETING THE JOB OF DEMOBILIZATION. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT FURTHER SERVICE ON THESE JOB?  1. I FEEL I HAVE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE AND SHOULD BE DISCHARGED 2. I FEEL I HAVE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE BUT AM READY TO DO MORE 3. I DON'T FEEL I HAVE DONE MY SHARE YET AND AM READY TO DO MORE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q29A. NOW THAT THE WAR IS OVER, HOW LONG DO YOU THINK IT WILL TAKE TO GET ALL THE TROOPS IN EUROPE BACK TO THE U.S.* (NOT COUNTING THE MEN WHO ARE CHOSEN FOR OCCUPATION DUTY.)  1. LESS THAN 4 MONTHS 2. 4-6 MONTHS 3. 7-11 MONTHS 4. 12 MONTHS AND OVER 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 29B NOT CODED.

S0235.Q30A. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE ENGLISH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA X. QUESTION 30B NOT CODED.

S0235.Q31. HOW LONG WERE YOU IN THE BRITISH ISLE?  01. LESS THAN 2 MONTHS 02. 2 TO LESS THAN 3 03. 3 TO LESS THAN 4 04. 4 TO LESS THAN 5 05. 5 TO LESS THAN 6 06. 6 TO LESS THAN 7 07. 7 TO LESS THAN 8 08. 8 TO LESS THAN 12 09. 12 TO LESS THAN 18 10. 18 MONTHS AND OVER 11. NO TIME (I WASN'T THERE) 00. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q32A. WHAT SORT OF OPINION DO YOU HAVE OF THE FRENCH PEOPL?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. RATHER UNFAVORABLE 4. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER X. Q.32B NOT CODED.

S0235.Q33. HOW MUCH TIME HAVE YOU SPENT IN FRANC? (DON'T COUNT TIME SPENT IN OTHER COUNTRIES SUCH AS BELGIUM, HOLLAND, GERMANY, ETC.)  01. LESS THAN 2 MONTHS 02. 2 TO LESS THAN 3 03. 3 TO LESS THAN 4 04. 4 TO LESS THAN 5 05. 5 TO LESS THAN 6 06. 6 TO LESS THAN 7 07. 7 TO LESS THAN 8 08. 8 TO LESS THAN 12 09. 12 TO LESS THAN 18 10. 18 MONTHS AND OVER 11. NO TIME (I WASN'T THERE) 00. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q34A. "CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, THE FRENCH HAVE DONE AS GOOD A JOB AS POSSIBLE OF FIGHTING THIS WAR*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q34B. "MOST FRENCH PEOPLE SINCERELY LIKE AMERICANS*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q34C. "THE FRENCH NATION IS SO WEAK AND SPLIT UP THAT IT WILL NEVER AMOUNT TO ANYTHING AGAIN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q34D. "MOST FRENCH PEOPLE UNDERSTAND AND APPRECIATE WHAT AMERICA HAS DONE TO HELP WIN THE WAR*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q34E. "WE SHOULD DO EVERYTHING WE CAN TO HELP FRANCE GET BACK ON HER FEET AS SOON AS POSSIBLE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q35. HOW DO YOU THINK WE WILL GET ALONG WITH ENGLAND AFTER THE WA?  1. WE WILL GET ALONG VERY WELL 2. WE WILL DISAGREE ABOUT SOME THINGS BUT MANAGE TO GET ALONG 3. WE WILL HAVE SOME SERIOUS DISAGREEMENTS BUT WE WON'T FIGHT EACH OTHER 4. WE WILL VERY LIKELY FIGHT EACH OTHER SOONER OR LATER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q36. HOW DO YOU THINK WE WILL GET ALONG WITH RUSSIA AFTER THE WA?  1. WE WILL GET ALONG VERY WELL 2. WE WILL DISAGREE ABOUT SOME THINGS BUT MANAGE TO GET ALONG 3. WE WILL HAVE SOME SERIOUS DISAGREEMENTS BUT WE WON'T FIGHT EACH OTHER 4. WE WILL VERY LIKELY FIGHT EACH OTHER SOONER OR LATER 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37A. "CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, THE BRITISH HAVE DONE AS GOOD A JOB AS POSSIBLE OF FIGHTING THIS WAR*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37B. "RUSSIA IS MORE INTERESTED IN DOMINATING OR CONTROLLING THE WORLD THAN SHE IS IN BUILDING A TRULY DEMOCRATIC WORLD*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37C. "THE BRITISH WILL TRY AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE TO WORK OUT A JUST AND LASTING PEACE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37D. "CONSIDERING EVERYTHING, THE RUSSIANS HAVE DONE AS GOOD A JOB AS POSSIBLE OF FIGHTING THIS WAR*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37E. "WE CAN COUNT ON RUSSIA TO DO EVERYTHING SHE CAN TO HELP US DEFEAT JAPAN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37F. "BRITAIN IS MORE INTERESTED IN DOMINATING OR CONTROLLING THE WORLD THAN SHE IS IN BUILDING A TRULY DEMOCRATIC WORLD*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37G. "WE CAN COUNT ON ENGLAND TO DO EVERYTHING SHE CAN TO HELP US DEFEAT JAPAN*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37H. "THE RUSSIANS WILL TRY AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE TO WORK OUT A JUST AND LASTING PEACE*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q37I. "MOST BRITISH PEOPLE UNDERSTAND AND APPRECIATE WHAT AMERICA HAS DONE TO HELP WIN THE WAR*"  1. AGREE 2. DISAGREE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q38. AFTER THE WAR, SOME OF OUR ALLIES WILL NEED HELP IN FEEDING THEIR PEOPLE. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD SEND FOOD TO THESE COUNTRIES EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT WE WOULD HAVE TO KEEP ON RATIONING FOOD IN OUR OWN COUNTRY FOR A WHILE TO DO I?  1. WE SHOULD SEND FOOD AFTER THE WAR, EVEN IF WE HAVE TO KEEP ON RATIONING FOOD IN THE U.S. IN ORDER TO DO IT 2. WE SHOULD NOT SEND FOOD IF IT MEANS WE HAVE TO KEEP ON RATIONING FOOD IN THE U.S. IN ORDER TO DO IT 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q39. AFTER THE WAR, SOME OF OUR ALLIES WILL NEED MONEY AND MATERIALS TO HELP THEM GET BACK ON THEIR FEET. DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD LET THEM HAVE MONEY AND MATERIALS TO HELP THEM GET BACK ON THEIR FEET, EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT WE SHOULD HAVE TO PAY HIGHER TAXES TO DO I?  1. WE SHOULD HELP THEM WITH MONEY AND MATERIALS AFTER THE WAR, EVEN IF IT MEANS HIGHER TAXES FOR US 2. WE SHOULD NOT HELP THEM WITH MONEY AND MATERIALS AFTER THE WAR IF IT MEANS HIGHER TAXES FOR US 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q40. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK THE DIFFERENT COUNTRIES (LIKE THE UNITED STATES, RUSSIA, ENGLAND, CHINA, FRANCE, ETC.) SHOULD SET UP A PERMANENT ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS TO TRY TO SETTLE QUARRELS BETWEEN COUNTRIES AND TRY TO PREVENT WA?  1. SHOULD BE SET UP 2. SHOULD NOT BE SET UP 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0235.Q41. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK THERE SHOULD BE A SPECIAL FORCE OF SOLDIERS FROM THE ARMIES OF A NUMBER OF DIFFERENT COUNTRIES THAT COULD BE SENT ANY PLACE THE INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION DECIDED THEY WERE NEEDE?  1. YES, THERE SHOULD BE AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY OF THAT KIND 2. NO, THERE SHOULD NOT BE AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY OF THAT KIND 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q42. WHICH DO YOU THINK WOULD BE THE BEST WAY FOR THE UNITED STATES TO TRY TO KEEP OUT OF WAR IN THE FUTUR?  1. STAY OUT OF WORLD AFFAIRS 2. JOIN A STRONG PERMANENT ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS 3. SOME OTHER WAY 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0235.Q43. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD JOIN A STRONG PERMANENT ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS, EVEN IF IT MEANS THAT THIS ORGANIZATION WOULD HAVE SOME SAY ABOUT HOW THE UNITED STATES DEALS WITH OTHER COUNTRIE?  1. YES, I THINK THE U.S. SHOULD JOIN 2. NO, I DON'T THINK THE U.S. SHOULD JOIN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q44. SUPPOSE THE U.S. HAD NOT BEEN ATTACKED BY JAPAN. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES WOULD HAVE HAD TO GET INTO THIS WAR ANYWAY, OR DO YOU THINK WE COULD HAVE STAYED OU?  1. WE COULD HAVE STAYED OUT, IF WE HAD NOT BEEN ATTACKED 2. WE WOULD HAVE HAD TO GET IN THE WAR SOONER OR LATER ANYWAY 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0235.Q45. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR WAS NOT WORTH FIGHTIN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q46. AFTER THE WAR IS OVER, DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES WILL BE A BETTER PLACE OR WORSE PLACE TO LIVE IN THAN IT WAS BEFORE THE WA?  1. BETTER AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 2. SAME AFTER THE WAR AS BEFORE THE WAR 3. WORSE AFTER THE WAR THAN BEFORE THE WAR 4. UNDECIDED 5. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0235.Q47A. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES WILL GET INTO ANOTHER BIG WAR WITHIN THE NEXT 25 YEAR?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA
S0235.Q47B. IF YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE IN ANOTHER BIG WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE FIGHTING AGAINS?  1. ENGLAND 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0235.Q47B. IF YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE IN ANOTHER BIG WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE FIGHTING AGAINS?  314 1. RUSSIA 1510 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0235.Q47B. IF YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE IN ANOTHER BIG WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE FIGHTING AGAINS?  14 1. CHINA 1810 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0235.Q47B. IF YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE IN ANOTHER BIG WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE FIGHTING AGAINS?  16 1. FRANCE 1808 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0235.Q47B. IF YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE IN ANOTHER BIG WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK THE U.S. WILL BE FIGHTING AGAINS?  60 1. GERMANY 1764 2. NOT CHOSEN X. COL. 80 NOT USED. CARD 2

S0235.Q48A. READ THE TWO STATEMENTS BELOW AND CHECK WHICH ONE YOU THINK IS THE MORE IMPORTANT REASON WHY WE GOT INTO THE WAR.  1. "WE GOT INTO THIS WAR BECAUSE ,BIG BUSINESS, IN THE UNITED STATES WAS LOOKING FOR MORE PROFITS" 2. "WE GOT INTO THIS WAR BECAUSE WE WERE ATTACKED" 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q48B. NOW READ THESE TWO STATEMENTS AND CHECK WHICH ONE YOU THINK IS THE MORE IMPORTANT REASON WHY WE GOT INTO THE WAR.  1. "WE GOT INTO THIS WAR TO DESTROY NAZISM AND FASCISM" 2. "WE GOT INTO THIS WAR BECAUSE ,BIG BUSINESS, IN THE UNITED STATES WAS LOOKING FOR MORE PROFITS" 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q48C. NOW CHECK WHICH ONE OF THESE TWO STATEMENTS YOU THINK IS THE MORE IMPORTANT REASON WHY WE GOT INTO THE WAR.  1. "WE GOT INTO THIS WAR TO DESTROY NAZISM AND FASCISM" 2. "WE GOT INTO THIS WAR BECAUSE WE WERE ATTACKED" 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q49A. READ THE TWO STATEMENTS BELOW AND CHECK THE ONE WHICH YOU THINK SHOULD BE THE MORE IMPORTANT PEACE AIM FOR THE UNITED STATE?  1. "TO SEE THAT THE NATIONS ORGANIZE TO PREVENT WARS IN THE FUTURE" 2. "TO SEE THAT THE UNITED STATES IS SO STRONG THAT NO NATIONS WOULD DARE ATTACK US" 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0235.Q49B. NOW READ THESE TWO STATEMENTS AND CHECK THE ONE YOU THINK SHOULD BE THE MORE IMPORTANT PEACE AIM FOR THE UNITED STATES.  1. "TO SEE THAT THE PEOPLE IN ALL COUNTRIES HAVE THE RIGHT TO GOVERN THEMSELVES" 2. "TO SEE THAT THE NATIONS ORGANIZE TO PREVENT WARS IN THE FUTURE" 3. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0235.Q49C. NOW CHECK WHICH ONE OF THESE TWO STATEMENTS SHOULD BE THE MORE IMPORTANT PEACE AIM FOR THE UNITED STATES.  1. "TO SEE THAT THE PEOPLE IN ALL COUNTRIES HAVE THE RIGHT TO GOVERN THEMSELVES" 2. "TO SEE THAT THE UNITED STATES IS SO STRONG THAT NO NATIONS WOULD DARE ATTACK US" 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q50A. SINCE D-DAY (6 JUNE 1944) HAVE YOU BEEN IN GERMANY AT ANY TIM? IF YES, HOW MANY WEEKS ALTOGETHER SINCE 6 JUNE 1944*  01. LESS THAN 4 WEEKS 02. 4-7 03. 8-11 04. 12-15 05. 16-19 06. 20-23 07. 24-27 08. 28-31 09. 32-35 10. 36 WEEKS OR MORE 11. NO TIME IN GERMANY 00. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q50B. SINCE VE-DAY (8 MAY 1945) HAVE YOU BEEN IN GERMANY AT ANY TIM? IF YES, HOW MANY WEEKS ALTOGETHER SINCE 8 MAY 1945*  01. LESS THAN 2 WEEKS 02. 2 03. 3 04. 4 05. 5 06. 6 07. 7 08. 8-11 09. 12-15 10. 16 WEEKS AND OVER 11. NO TIME IN GERMANY 00. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q51. CHECK THE ONE STATEMENT BELOW THAT COMES CLOSEST TO EXPRESSING HOW YOU FEEL TOWARD GERMAN SOLDIERS.  1. I HAVE A STRONG HATRED TOWARDS GERMAN SOLDIERS 2. I HAVE A GREAT DISLIKE FOR THEM, BUT DON'T HATE THEM 3. SOMETIMES I HAVE STRONG FEELINGS AGAINST THEM, SOMETIMES NO PARTICULAR FEELINGS 4. I DON'T HAVE ANY STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT THEM 5. I FEEL THEY ARE LIKE US AND HAVE DONE WHAT THEY THOUGHT WAS THEIR DUTY 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q52. CHECK THE ONE STATEMENT BELOW THAT COMES CLOSEST TO EXPRESSING HOW YOU FEEL TOWARD GERMAN COMMON PEOPLE.  1. I HAVE A STRONG HATRED TOWARDS GERMAN COMMON PEOPLE 2. I HAVE A GREAT DISLIKE FOR THEM, BUT DON'T HATE THEM 3. SOMETIMES I HAVE STRONG FEELINGS AGAINST THEM, SOMETIMES NO PARTICULAR FEELINGS 4. I DON'T HAVE ANY STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT THEM 5. I FEEL THEY ARE LIKE US AND HAVE DONE WHAT THEY THOUGHT WAS THEIR DUTY 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q53. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED NATIONS SHOULD KEEP AN OCCUPATION FORCE IN GERMANY FOR SOME YEARS AFTER THE WAR, EVEN IF IT MEANS THE U.S. WILL HAVE TO FURNISH A CONSIDERABLE NUMBER OF TROOPS IN ORDER TO DO I?  1. YES 2. NO 3. NOT SURE 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q54A. HOW MANY OF THE AMERICAN SOLDIERS (IN THAT PART OF GERMANY YOU HAVE BEEN IN) DO YOU THINK HAVE HAD SOME FRIENDLY CONTACT WITH GERMAN GIRL? (FOR EXAMPLE, TALKING, JOKING OR FLIRTING WITH THEM, ETC.)  1. ALMOST NONE OF THE SOLDIERS HAVE 2. A FEW OF THEM HAVE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM HAVE 4. MOST OF THEM HAVE 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM HAVE 6. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN GERMANY ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q54B. HOW MANY OF THE AMERICAN SOLDIERS THERE DO YOU THINK HAVE HAD SOME FRIENDLY CONTACT WITH OLDER GERMAN CIVILIAN? (FOR EXAMPLE, TALKING WITH THEM, PASSING THE TIME OF DAY, ETC.)  1. ALMOST NONE OF THE SOLDIERS HAVE 2. A FEW OF THEM HAVE 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM HAVE 4. MOST OF THEM HAVE 5. ALMOST ALL OF THEM HAVE 6. I HAVE NOT BEEN IN GERMANY ENOUGH TO SAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q54C. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF - HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU HAD SOME FRIENDLY CONTACT WITH OLDER GERMAN CIVILIAN?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. FAIRLY OFTEN 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. ALMOST NEVER 5. I HAVEN'T BEEN IN GERMANY 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q55. IN THE THREE QUESTIONS ABOVE WERE SOME EXAMPLES OF SOCIAL CONTACTS THAT AMERICAN SOLDIERS MAY HAVE WITH GERMAN CIVILIANS. DO YOU PERSONALLY BELIEVE THERE ARE GOOD REASONS FOR NOT HAVING SUCH CONTACTS WITH GERMAN CIVILIAN?  1. YES, I THINK THERE ARE GOOD REASONS 2. NO, I DON'T THINK THERE ARE GOOD REASONS 0. NO ANSWER

S0235.Q56. DO YOU THINK THAT THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE ARE TO BLAME FOR STARTING THE WAR, OR DO YOU THINK THAT IT IS REALLY JUST THE GROUP OF NAZI MILITARISTIC LEADERS WHO ARE TO BLAM?  1.
